title: Information Policy & Mgt
description: An introduction to the role of information and knowledge in modern private and public organizations. It covers theoretical and practical aspects of information seeking, gathering and use in organizations as well as knowledge creation and its role in private and public management.  Credit not awarded for both PUBP 6501 and PUBP 4501.
